job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWere a team of passionate data scientists software engineers and subject matter experts with a vision to disrupt the simulation market by empowering users to build custom digital twin models that combine physics math and AI to solve various challenging problems in the energy industry and beyondppbrppWere looking for entrylevel or seasoned frontend developers to help us build innovative features for our webbased dashboard The following summarizes the requirements and benefits of this rolenbspppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliBuilding intuitive experiences for users and data managementliliImplementing simple yet powerful visualization tools for scientific and engineering applicationsliliCreating interactive user experiences involving humanhuman and humanAI collaborationsliulpbrppstrongCore SkillsstrongpulliSelfdriven curious and passionate software developerliliStrong problemsolving skills or good engineering  scientific judgmentliliTeam player comfortable working in an Agile environmentliulpbrppstrongCoding SkillsstrongpulliPractical experience building eventdriven and dynamic web applicationsliliExperience working with React or similar JS frameworks is preferred but not requiredliliComfortable with objectoriented programming writing tested code and good software designliulpbrppstrongBackgroundstrongpulliA Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related fields is preferred but not requiredliliPermission to work in the USliulpbrppstrongPerksstrongpulliCompetitive compensation and benefitslili3 weeks of paid vacation per yearliliFlexible remote work cultureliul
